remarks: Lemma for ~ frege55a .  Proposition 53 of [Frege1879] p. 50. _Note:_ in the Bauer-Meenfelberg translation published in van Heijenoort's collection _From Frege to Goedel_, this proof has the minor clause and result swapped.  (Contributed by RP, 24-Dec-2019.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement: frege53a $p |- ( if- ( ph , th , ch ) -> ( ( ph <-> ps ) -> if- ( ps , th , ch ) ) ) $.
